statements: SELECT * FROM blockchain_supply_chain WHERE supplier_name='Supplier A'
SELECT product_name, manufacturer_name, supplier_location FROM blockchain_supply_chain WHERE manufacturer_location='Location X'
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM blockchain_supply_chain GROUP BY supplier_name
SELECT * FROM blockchain_supply_chain ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT manufacturer_location, supplier_name, product_name FROM blockchain_supply_chain WHERE manufacturer_name='Manufacturer B'
SELECT * FROM blockchain_supply_chain WHERE supplier_name='ABC Inc.' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT product_name, supplier_name, manufacturer_name FROM blockchain_supply_chain WHERE supplier_location='USA' ORDER BY manufacturer_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT manufacturer_name FROM blockchain_supply_chain WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY manufacturer_name;
SELECT product_id, supplier_name, manufacturer_name, timestamp FROM blockchain_supply_chain WHERE manufacturer_location='Europe';
SELECT product_name, supplier_location FROM blockchain_supply_chain WHERE supplier_name='XYZ Corp' AND manufacturer_location='Asia';
SELECT * FROM product;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM product;
SELECT product_id, product_name, production_date FROM product ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, destination, shipment_date FROM shipment WHERE status = 'In Transit';
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_description FROM product WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Company';
SELECT * FROM product WHERE manufacturer='ABC Inc.';
SELECT product_id, product_name, production_date FROM product ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, product_id, destination, shipment_date FROM shipment WHERE status='Delivered' ORDER BY shipment_date ASC;
SELECT product.product_name, shipment.destination FROM product JOIN shipment ON product.product_id = shipment.product_id;
SELECT shipment_id, product.product_name, shipment.destination FROM product, shipment WHERE product.product_id = shipment.product_id;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_id, product_name, manufacturer FROM Product WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple';
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location, supplier_rating FROM Supplier ORDER BY supplier_rating DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, product_id, supplier_id, transaction_date FROM Transaction WHERE transaction_type = 'Sale';
SELECT * FROM Transaction WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM Product
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, production_date FROM Product WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple'
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location, supplier_rating FROM Supplier ORDER BY supplier_rating DESC
SELECT transaction_id, product_id, supplier_id, transaction_date, transaction_type FROM Transaction WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Transaction WHERE product_id = 2
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, delivery_status FROM products WHERE manufacturer_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, product_name, production_date FROM products WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT manufacturer_name, location FROM manufacturers WHERE manufacturer_id = 2;
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouses WHERE warehouse_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, delivery_status FROM products
SELECT * FROM manufacturers WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM products WHERE manufacturer_id = 1
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouses ORDER BY warehouse_name DESC
SELECT t.product_id, p.product_name, w.warehouse_name FROM transactions t JOIN products p ON t.product_id = p.product_id JOIN warehouses w ON t.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id
SELECT * FROM blockchain_products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_description FROM blockchain_products WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, location, contact_email FROM suppliers;
SELECT shipment_id, product_id, quantity, shipment_date FROM shipments ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
SELECT node_id, node_name, node_location FROM blockchain_nodes WHERE is_mining = true;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_products WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM blockchain_products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT supplier_name, location, contact_person FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT shipment_id, quantity, shipment_date FROM shipments WHERE supplier_id = 3 ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
SELECT node_name, node_location, is_mining FROM blockchain_nodes WHERE is_mining = TRUE;
